description.value: An extension to indicate if the medicine is used or not

purpose.value: This extension represents UseIndicator of [MedicationUse](https://zibs.nl/wiki/MedicationUse2-v1.1.1(2020EN)). In R4 the `MedicationStatement.taken` element has been removed and replaced with a _not-taken_ code in `MedicationStatement.status`. This approach is however not suited because StopType has also been mapped to the `status` element. It therefore not possible to exchange the UseIndicator and StopType ath the same time.
